p: The Thermo Scientific UHPLC Ultimate 3000 apparatus (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA), connected to an ESI-qTOF Compact (Bruker Daltonics, Bremen, Germany) HRMS detector was used. Separation was achieved on a Kinetex RP-18 column (100 × 2.1 mm × 2.6 μm; Phenomenex, Torrance, CA, USA). The UHPLC-ESI-MS instrument was operated in negative mode.
